01_wonder_woman_1984.description: Cheetah face and body replacement + enhancement and some tricky integrating cg fur into splashing water.

02_the_kingss_man.description: Set Extension and CG creatures on bluescreen sets.

03_no_time_to_die.description: Car chase scene, stitching and comping multi-camera plates into bg of car interior. Had quite an extreme camera rack following action starting windscreen ending side on.

04_a_boy_called_christmas.description: A handful of cg character in hand integration, shots of a character riding a cg animal with tricky keying, and a cool dmp pov shot.
